565000.name: Riders of Icarus: Elite Ranger's Fury Package
565000.description:
The all-new Ranger class has arrived and the time has come for you to mount up and prepare for your journey into the deadly wasteland known as the Cloying Wastes. Gear up for your adventure with the Elite Ranger's Fury Package and receive the following items:

Daily Ellun Pack (5) x20
  • Grants 5 Elluns per day for 20 days

Bag (16 slot)

Mount: Thundershield Zepiros

Pet: Tritty

Pet: Twilight Rabbini

Defensive Talisman (30-day)
  • Overall Defense +10%
  • Health +10%
  • Health +200
  • Base Health Regen +100%

Generalist Talisman (30-day)
  • Cooldown -10%
  • Familiar EXP +50%
  • Drop Rate +20%

100% Health Potion x10

100% Familiar Potion x10

Limit 1 Elite Ranger's Fury Package per account. Package is not transferable.
565000.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
